title: English Oral Presentation and Online Collaboration Skills Development Course for Adult Learners

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Learners acquire practical skills via real presentation environment simulations and conduct team projects using VR-based collaboration tools

learning_goals: Learners can structure and deliver an English oral presentation within three minutes
Learners can collaboratively create presentation materials in real-time with team members using online collaboration tools
Learners can improve presentation content after analyzing audience reactions in VR simulation environments
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
